title: Independence National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Independence Square Museum Store        The Independence Square Museum Store offers a variety of souvenirs. Photo by Joseph E.B. Elliott       Shop the Independence Square Museum Store   You've seen the "Birthplace of the United States," now get the t-shirt...that makes a difference.        The Independence Square Museum Store offers a variety of souvenirs, including t-shirts. NPS Photo  Are you looking for a souvenir of your visit to Independence Hall or the Liberty Bell? Do you want to do more to help Independence National Historical Park? Then shop the Independence Square Museum Store! All proceeds go to help fund programming at Independence National Historical Park.       The Independence Square Museum Store offers a variety of souvenirs, such as miniature Liberty Bells, postcards, magnets, Park Ranger-recommended books and films, and yes, t-shirts. Many fine gift items are available as well.         The Independence Square Museum Store is located inside Old City Hall at the corner of 5th and Chestnut Streets. NPS Photo  The Museum Store is open daily from March through December and is located inside historic Old City Hall at the corner of 5th and Chestnut Streets.       The Museum Store is operated by Eastern National, a non-profit organization which currently operates retail outlets in 30 States, offering quality products, publications, and services to visitors of National Parks. All items offered have a strong educational value, with profits funding National Park Service programs.
